Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with 11 months history of Body Aches. he is a white male aged 73 Ys. occasional EtOH Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 64 in, Weight 206 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 91, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed acetaminophen - 650 mg up to 4x day, and ordered RF, Knee XRY.

td.content: s:a 73 yr old male retired presents with Body Aches for 5 weeks. he has a history of Rheumatoid Arthritis for past 4 years. o:Height 64 in, Weight 203 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed acetaminophen - 650 mg up to 4x day, and ordered ESR.
